title.en: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)

altTitles.ja: 銀河英雄伝説

description.en:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
description.ru:
История человечества всегда была историей войн, во все времена, во все эпохи. И во все эпохи находятся люди, оставляющие след в истории, чьи имена выжжены на её скрижалях. Этих людей называют героями.  
В третьем тысячелетии, когда люди давно переселились с Земли на просторы Галактики, между абсолютной монархией Галактический Рейх и республикой Союз Свободных Планет уже 150 лет продолжается война. И на озарённом пламенем войны небосклоне зажигаются звёзды героев, судьба которых - изменить мир.

altTitles.ja: BEAT＆MOTION
ビートアンドモーション

description.en: The winner of the MILLION TAG manga competition! A new era of manga begins with this series about the struggle and joy of creating art. Anime and music collide in this new series about growing up and reaching for your dreams!

title.en: Heimin Shusshin no Teikoku Shoukan, Munou na Kizoku Joukan wo Juurin shite Nariagaru

altTitles.ja: 平民出身の帝国将官、無能な貴族上官を蹂躙して成り上がる

altTitles.en: The Rising of the Commoner-Origin Officer: Beat up All the Incompetent Noble Superiors!
The Commoner-Born Imperial General Officer Rises Through the Ranks by Crushing His Incompetent Noble Superiors.

altTitles.id: Pemberontakan Sang Perwira Rakyat Biasa: Berantas Semua Bangsawan Atas Tidak Becus

description.en:
All the bosses are annoying! The reincarnated strongest magician's trampling and subjugation begins!

Hazen Heim, a newly appointed imperial general, is demoted to the front line because he is a commoner. There were a lot of incompetent people, such as "a trash superior who takes advantage of his position to steal the achievements of his subordinates", "an evil subordinate who keeps bullying people below him", and "a top who is too opportunistic to do anything''. 

However, Hazen has the experience and overwhelming ability as the strongest magician that he cultivated in his previous life. He slaughters his malevolent subordinates in accordance with military law, and completely refutes his superiors who complain. He achieved extraordinary results, such as making peace with a hostile tribe by teaming up with a genius girl, and defeated all the annoying bosses!

An exhilarating upstart fantasy about an unscrupulous superior!
description.ja: 新任帝国将官のヘーゼンは平民出身を理由に最前線に左遷、そこは無能の上官ばかりであった。だが彼には前世で培った、最強魔法使いとしての経験と圧倒的実力がある。

title.en: Toki Majutsushi no Tsuyokute New Game ~Kako ni Modotte Sekai Saikyou kara Yarinaosu~

altTitles.ja: 時魔術士の強くてニューゲーム ～過去に戻って世界最強からやり直す～

altTitles.en: The Time Mage's Strong New Game: I Returned to the Past to Rewrite It as the World's Strongest

description.en: After 100 years of hard work, the hero, chrome, has become the world’s only Chronomancer. However, by the time he became the world’s strongest, all the people and towns he wanted to protect were lost. And so the course he chose… is to go back to his childhood and start his life all over again…?!
description.ja: 100年の努力を経て、世界唯一の時魔術士となったクロム。しかし、彼が世界最強となった頃には、守りたかった人や町は全て失われていた。そこで彼が選んだ道は――少年時代に戻って人生をもう一度やり直すこと！早くに死に別れた幼馴染たち、優しかった師匠夫妻、まだ平和だった故郷の町……かつてそこにあった平穏を守るため、未来の魔術と知識を駆使して無双しろ！すべてのターニングポイントは、今日の夕方に起こる"大災厄"……。
description.pt-br:
Após 100 anos de trabalho duro, o herói, Chrome, tornou-se o único Chronomancer do mundo. No entanto, no momento em que ele se tornou o mais forte do mundo, todas as pessoas e cidades que ele queria proteger estavam perdidas.

E assim o curso que ele escolheu... é voltar à sua infância e começar sua vida de novo...?!

Esta é a melhor história de fantasia de lapso temporal!

altTitles.ja: 石神戦記

description.en: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...? The war romance by Iroha Kohinata has just begun!

**Description translated from the author:**
University graduate Mu Siyun sent his resume to the star fleet on a whim and somehow became the Fleet Admiral! This is the story about an admiral with a harem of 3000 female soldiers conquering the universe.

---

**Translator's version:**
The smartest university student to ever graduate from Daxia University's Department of Political History, Mu Siyun, enlists in Beiyang's Fleet on a whim and somehow becomes the Fleet Admiral. Knowing fully well how the world works and how the rich dominate the poor, Mu Siyun seeks to defy the heavens and bring order and hope back to the universe by cleverly scheming against his enemies.
description.ru: По прихоти судьбы выпускник университета Му Сыюнь отправил свое резюме в звёздный флот и каким-то образом стал адмиралом флота! Это история об адмирале с гаремом в 3000 женщин-солдат, покоряющих вселенную…
description.tr: Üniversiteden mezun olan Mu Siyun, bir heves ile öz geçmişini yıldız filosuna yollar ve her nasılsa filo amirali olur! bu hikaye 3000 kız askerin bir filo amiraliyle evreni ele geçirmesini anlatıyor…

description.en: The world is riddled with beasts and demons, however little do people know that a magical barrier is currently sealing away high-level demons. There are those who wish to break the barrier and bring about the end of the world, and those who wish to protect it and its inhabitants. A great battle with heroes, villains, demons and magic is about to begin and will determine the fate of the world.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

description.en: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

altTitles.ja: 永井豪版 ばるぼら
豪 TO トラベル

description.en:
"Barbara" was originally serialized by Osamu Tezuka from 1973 to 1974. The original story tells of an encounter between the novelist, Yosuke Mikura, and the mysterious woman with an alcohol addiction, Barbara. In celebration of the live-action film adaptation directed by Makoto Tazuka, Go Nagai, a master artist, brings a unique interpretation of this world. A dream collaboration between the two great masters... Is born here and now!!
[From the back of the book] 

This story can also be considered a sequel. This time the mystical Barbara has charmed a painter, Kyosuke Mitamura. And later a musician, Goro Nikaido. Both are excellent artist in their own fields but their careers have hit a slump. Is Barbara the remedy for these men's artistic struggles or is she only poison for their work? 

Includes bonus story "Go and Travel" about Tezuka’s and Nagai’s trip to San Diego, USA in 1980.

title.en: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo,

altTitles.ja: キミが吠えるための歌を、
キミ吠え

description.en: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group… A shared story of music and youth between two girls, each burdened by the past.
description.ja: 幼い見た目とチグハグな低い声に悩む女子高生・大神晴は、ひそかに「歌ってみた」動画をあげる日々を送っていたが、クラスメイトの鳴宮優雨に歌声を聞かれてしまう。「馬鹿にされる…」と怯える晴だったが、優雨は「私とユニットを組んでプロを目指そう」と誘ってきて… 。くするぶる想いを抱える少女二人の、音楽青春ストーリー！

altTitles.ja: カッコいい女の子と12センチの約束

altTitles.ja-ro: Kakkoi Onnanoko to 12 cm no Yakusoku

altTitles.en: A Cool Girl and a 12cm Promise

altTitles.es-la: Una chica genial y una promesa de 12 cm

description.en:
Tomoaki Kamba admired his boyish childhood friend, Ibuki Tachibana, and promised to become "more cool" than her.

However, four years have passed, and Ibuki has grown up to be an even more handsome girl! Their relationship is as unchanged as a 12cm height difference that cannot be filled...?

The curtain rises on a pure love story about a cool girl who is sorely in love with a boy who wants to be cool!

---

Serialization of the Twitter webcomic *[A Story About Becoming Cooler Than the Cool Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/d0407445-b80d-4854-9f12-c8227f94cba6/)*.
description.ja:
椛 智明(かんば ともあき)はボーイッシュな幼なじみ、立華 一颯(たちばな いぶき)に憧れ、彼女より「もっとカッコよくなる」と約束をする。

しかし４年が経ち、一颯はさらに超イケメン女子に成長!! 二人の関係は埋まらない12センチの身長差と同じく、変わらない…？

カッコいい女の子が、カッコよくなりたい男の子にきゅんとするピュアなラブストーリーの幕開け━━。

altTitles.ja: ガルルガール

description.en: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
description.es: Tras ingresar a la preparatoria, el joven, Mochizuki, se reencuentra con su primer amor, Kawa. Aunque Kawa ha crecido y se ha convertido en una hermosa y refinada jovencita, la extraña proximidad entre ellos no ha cambiado desde sus días de travesuras. Poco después de ingresar a la escuela, Mochizuki se encuentra incómodo con la transformación de Kawa en la flor inalcanzable del campus, pero un incidente desencadena el descubrimiento de su 'secreto'. La verdadera identidad de la chica de su primer amor resulta ser una chica lobo. ¿Cómo cambiará esto su relación? ¡Una comedia romántica entre un chico inocente y una chica lobo que pertenecen a diferentes razas!

altTitles.th: ลิขิตรักบัลลังก์ต่างโลก

altTitles.ja: 異世界の皇妃

description.en: Crossing over into another world and time after a freak accident, Korean highschool girl Sabina is taken in by a duke of the Crentia kingdom— only to soon be offered up to the ugly old emperor as a concubine. When the king is killed by a mysterious assassin, Sabina must face the poisonous circle of other candidates in a battle for the royal seat. Can she attract the loyalty and affection of the men and women she needs on her side to survive?

altTitles.ja: カグラバチ

description.cs: Mladý Chihiro tráví dny tréninkem pod vedením svého slavného otce kováře. Doufá, že jednoho dne sám stane slavným kovářem mečů. Praštěný otec a vážný syn – mysleli si, že tyto dny budou trvat věčně. Najednou však dojde k tragédii. Temný den plný krve. Chihiro a jeho čepel nyní žijí jen pro pomstu. Epická bitevní akce s katanou!
description.en: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge. Epic sword battle action!
description.ru: Юный Тихиро проводит дни, тренируясь под руководством своего знаменитого отца-мечника, который издавна изготавливает катаны для начала и конца войн. Однажды Тихиро надеется сам стать великим мастером мечей. Легкомысленный отец и серьезный сын — они думали, что эти спокойные дни будут длиться вечно. Но внезапно случается трагедия. Темный день, пропитанный кровью. Тихиро и его клинок теперь живут только ради мести...
description.tr: Genç Chihiro günlerini ünlü kılıç ustası babasının yanında eğitim alarak geçirmektedir. Bir gün kendisi de büyük bir kılıç ustası olmayı ummaktadır. Şapşal baba ve ciddi oğul, bugünlerin sonsuza dek süreceğini düşünmektedirler. Ama aniden bir trajedi yaşanır. Kana bulanmış karanlık bir gün. Chihiro ve kılıcı artık sadece intikam için yaşamaktadır. Destansı kılıç savaşı aksiyonu!
description.pt-br: O jovem Chihiro passa seus dias treinando com seu famoso pai ferreiro. Um dia ele espera se tornar um grande fabricante de espadas. O pai bobo e o filho sério – eles pensavam que esses dias durariam para sempre. Mas de repente, a tragédia acontece. Um dia escuro, encharcado de sangue. Chihiro e sua lâmina agora vivem apenas para vingança. Ação épica de batalha de espadas!

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

title.en: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.ja: クラスで２番目に可愛い女の子と友だちになった

altTitles.en: I Became Friends with the Second Cutest Girl in My Class

altTitles.ja-ro: Class de 2 Banme ni Kawaii Onna no Ko to Tomodachi ni Natta

altTitles.id: Aku Berteman dengan Gadis Paling Cantik Kedua di Kelas ku

altTitles.it: Sono diventato amico con la seconda ragazza più carina nella mia classe

description.en:
I, Maehara Maki, someone who couldn’t make any acquaintances or friends in high school, finally had someone I can hang out with outside of school. A girl.

Her name was Asanagi-san. The boys in my class called her ‘The class’ second cutest girl’ behind her back.

On Fridays, she would refuse her best friend, Amami, ‘the cutest girl in class’ invitation just to hang out in my house with me.

Together, we played games, watched some movies, read some manga while eating junk foods like pizza and hamburgers, and chugging cola without a care in the world. To others, we may seem sloppy, but it was a precious, secret time together for Asanagi-san and myself.
description.id:
Aku, Maehara Maki, seseorang yang tidak memiliki kenalan atau teman di SMA, akhirnya memiliki seseorang yang bisa aku ajak bergaul di luar sekolah. Seorang gadis.

Namanya Asanagi-san. Anak-anak laki-laki di kelas saya memanggilnya 'Gadis paling imut kedua di kelas' di belakangnya.

Pada hari Jumat, dia akan menolak ajakan sahabatnya, Amami, 'gadis paling manis di kelas' hanya untuk berkumpul di rumah ku dengan ku.

Bersama-sama, kami bermain game, menonton film, membaca manga sambil makan junk food seperti pizza dan hamburger, dan menenggak cola tanpa peduli dengan dunia. Bagi orang lain, kami mungkin terlihat ceroboh, tetapi itu adalah waktu yang berharga, waktu rahasia bersama untuk Asanagi-san dan ku sendiri.
description.es-la: Yo, Maehara Maki, alguien que no podía conocer ni hacer amigos en la escuela secundaria, finalmente tenía a alguien con quien podía pasar el rato fuera de la escuela. Una mujer. Su nombre era Asanagi-san. Los chicos de mi clase la llamaban "La segunda chica más linda de la clase'" a sus espaldas. Los viernes, rechazaba la invitación de su mejor amiga, Amami, "la chica más linda de la clase" solo para pasar el rato en mi casa conmigo. Juntos, jugamos, vimos algunas películas, leímos manga mientras comíamos comida chatarra como pizza y hamburguesas, y tomábamos refrescos de cola sin preocuparnos por nada. Para otros, podemos parecer descuidados, pero fue un tiempo secreto y precioso para Asanagi-san y para mí.
description.pt-br:
Eu, Maehara Maki, alguém que não conseguia conhecer ou fazer amigos no ensino médio, finalmente consegui alguém com quem eu pudesse sair fora da escola. Uma garota.

O nome dela era Asanagi-san. Os meninos da minha turma a chamavam de 'a segunda garota mais fofa da turma' pelas costas.

Às sextas-feiras, ela recusava o convite de sua melhor amiga, Amami, 'a garota mais fofa da classe' só para ficar na minha casa comigo.

Juntos, jogamos, assistimos a alguns filmes, lemos alguns mangás enquanto comíamos junk food como pizza e hambúrgueres e bebíamos refrigerantes sem nenhuma preocupação no mundo. Para outros, podemos parecer desleixados, mas foi um tempo precioso e secreto juntos para Asanagi-san e eu.

altTitles.ja: 呪術廻戦

description.en:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, her soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
description.fr:
Yuuji est un jeune étudiant qui excelle dans le sport, notamment dans l'athlétisme, mais qui a un immense poil dans la main. Du coup, au lieu de parfaire ses capacités physiques qui pourraient lui permettre de devenir le meilleur de l'établissement, il s'est inscrit au club de recherches occultes du lycée. Son petit train-train va changer du tout au tout lorsqu'un véritable esprit malfaiteur vient menacer son école…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Ki-oon**
description.ru: Юдзи гений на поле! Вот только школьная активность его мало чем привлекает. Став частью клуба оккультных исследований он решает зажить тихой жизнью, но все меняется, когда в школе объявляются духи.
description.tr: Yuuji bir atletizm dehasıdır ama koşuya hiç ilgisi yoktur. Bilinmezleri Araştırma Kulübünde çok mutludur. Her ne kadar kulüpte eğlencesine bulunsa bile, okulda gerçek bir ruh ortaya çıkınca işler ciddiye biner! Hayat, Sugisawa Şehrindeki 3 Numaralı Lisedeki çocuklar için tuhaflaşmaya başlamak üzere!
description.uk: Ітадорі Юуджі - надзвичайно талановитий старшокласник із Сендаю. Утім, хоч він і вправний спортсмен, його не цікавлять спортивні клуби: він піклується про свого дідуся, що лежить у місцевій лікарні. Все змінюється, коли через жартівливий спіритичний сеанс на Юуджі та його друзів раптово нападають моторошні чудовиська, яких дивакуватий незнайомець, Фушіґуро Меґумі, чомусь називає прокляттями. Аби врятувати себе та друзів, Юуджі змушений ризикнути - і так випадково стати вмістилищем легендарного, наймогутнішого короля проклять. А потім на тобі - вирок: "тебе мають стратити". Ну і що робити? Тяжкий вибір, магічна школа, нові друзі й нові проблеми - так починається його шлях...
description.pt-br: Itadori Yuuji, um estudante do colegial com uma capacidade física única, tem como rotina visitar seu avô que está hospitalizado. Porém, um dia, o selo de um "objeto amaldiçoado" escondido em sua escola é rompido, fazendo surgir criaturas assustadoras. Para salvar seus colegas ele parte em direção ao colégio, quando algo inesperado acontece...!

description.en:
Sick of his repetitive lifestyle, Gaeul decides to go on the trip he’s been putting off due to his many fears. He arrives in Paris with an excited heart in anticipation of a new relationship, but Gaeul’s partner doesn’t show up. Tired of waiting, he goes to find his partner, but to make matters worse, he bumps into someone who takes Gaeul’s precious handkerchief as garbage…?

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon [<Travel Short Stories Vacation Sex>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1471043087007105026) and the 10th Story (Ch.33-36) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/vacationsex)
description.ko:
매일 챗바귀 같은 일상에 지쳐있던 가을은 그동안 겁이 많아 가지 못했던 여행을 떠나기로 결심한다.
새로운 인연을 기대하며 부푼 마음을 안고 파리에 도착했지만, 가을의 파트너는 나타나지 않는다.
기다리다 지쳐 상대를 찾아가려던 중 설상가상으로 누군가와 부딪히게 되고
그로부터 자신의 소중한 손수건을 쓰레기 취합당하게 되는데...?

---
- **Note:** 
Part of Bomtoon [<Travel Short Stories Vacation Sex>](https://twitter.com/studio_Weiib/status/1471043087007105026) and the 10th Story (Ch.33-36) on [<Lezhin>](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/vacationsex)

altTitles.en: Possibly the Greatest Alchemist of All Time

altTitles.ja: いずれ最強の錬金術師?

altTitles.en: Someday Will I Be the Greatest Alchemist?

description.en:
Not even a hero, Takumi Iruma gets accidentally mixed in with a group of heroes chosen to be summoned to another world. As compensation for the mix-up, a goddess offers him the right to choose any skill he wishes for! Hoping for a peaceful and quiet life that has nothing to do with fighting or going into battle, he chooses a seemingly boring creation skill. However, it turns out "alchemy" is the most powerful skill that allows him to create everything from a holy sword to flying ships! This cheat skill he unexpectedly acquired turns him into a wealthy merchant and makes him undefeatable in battles! A heartwarming adventure story about (possibly) the most powerful alchemist in another world!

*Alpha Manga*

---

*Alternate description:*

Iruma Takumi, a 40-year old salary man, was dragged into a hero summoning just like in a template. What was his fate? The Goddess sent him and the heroes to the other world separately.  
  
With the Goddess’ overprotective support, he landed in a different world looking handsome, rejuvenated, and quite different from a Japanese.  
  
Although he wanted a slow life while working in the manufacturing trade, that was not permitted by the Goddess’ special body and abilities.  
  
Would Takumi be able to live a peaceful life in a different world?

title.en: Akuyaku Reijou no Dere wa Ore Dake ni Barete Iru

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢のデレは俺だけにバレている
悪役令嬢が実は心が綺麗な良い娘であると俺だけが知っている。

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou ga Jitsuwa Kokoro ga Kireina yoi Musumedearu to Oredake ga Shitteiru

altTitles.en: Only I Know About the Villainess' Dere
Only I Know That the Villainess Is Actually a Good Girl With a Beautiful Heart

altTitles.zh: 唯我独占恶役千金的娇羞

description.en:
The protagonist was reincarnated into an otome game as the first prince. He had played the otome game in his past life, and knew that the villainess was actually not evil and had lived an unlucky life. He searched for the route where the villainess was saved through all media, but he couldn’t find it and gave up. But this time, he was determined to save her.

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054918169629), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3771gk/)

altTitles.ja: 清田さんは汚されたい！？

description.en:
Sumiko Kiyota is a plain, ordinary girl with a serious demeanor. While eating lunch alone as usual 
Yuki Shirakawa, the most beautiful and popular girl in class, calls out to her...
description.ja: キレイ好きで真面目で平凡な女子高生・清田澄子。ある日、昼食を食べていると学園いちの美少女・白河ユキにパンをかじられる。その日を境に二人の距離は急接近！　体操着を借りたり、相合傘をしたり、潔癖な清田さんに次々と試練が襲いかかる。「もしかして白河さん、私を汚そうとしている？」　清田さんの妄想はエスカレートしていくが…!?

altTitles.ja: 薄明に充ちる

description.en:
The youngest son of the Shin family, Shinhou, has idolized Shousei, his childhood friend and mentor, since he was young. He vows to become the strongest in the Shin family and win against Shousei, the strong, beautiful, and dignified figure he admires and trusts.

However, their families’ conflict forces them to turn their blades against each other… Shinhou, under orders to exterminate the entire Shou family, refuses to fight Shousei—the person he loves and cherishes most—and allows him, the sole survivor, to escape. In doing so, he chooses to part ways from the path they once walked together, knowing they will never meet again.

Fifty years after their separation, Shinhou returns to his family home following his father’s assassination—only to find Shousei, whom he thought he’d never see again.

altTitles.ja: 今朝も揺られてます

altTitles.en: They are Still Being Shaken This Morning

description.en: This is your typical story of a boy who's secretly in love with a girl, they both share a 20 minute ride on the commuter train on their way to different schools, will the boy be able to approach the girl and confess his love? And also... What he doesn't know: There's 3 other passengers that secretly support the boy's secret love towards the girl! Read now the hijinks that ensue when the boy tries to approach the girl; from the creator of *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* and *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.
description.ja: 午前6時58分舞原行きの通学電車。名前も知らないあの子と僕…とその乗客!? 高校生の男女2人が醸し出す甘酸っぱい雰囲気に、乗客たちが心情駄々洩れで盛り上がる!!
description.pt-br: Esta é a típica história de um garoto que está secretamente apaixonado por uma garota. Ambos compartilham uma viagem de 20 minutos no trem do subúrbio a caminho de escolas diferentes. O garoto será capaz de se aproximar da garota e confessar seu amor? E, além disso... O que ele não sabe: há três outros passageiros que secretamente apoiam o amor secreto do garoto pela garota! Leia agora as confusões que acontecem quando o garoto tenta se aproximar da garota; do criador de *[Jitsu wa Watashi wa](https://mangadex.org/title/a990c2a1-b54f-4f4f-986c-3cdab1c9f2f9/)* e *[Yumemi ga Oka Wonderland](https://mangadex.org/title/32bbfefa-8a58-462c-bc9e-e9dd3bd4c152/)*.

altTitles.ja: メリーさん

description.en:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.

Cheongwook and Unho have been living together for three months due to unavoidable circumstances. These two, who have nothing to do with each other, keep fighting over trivial matters. Just when the anger between them builds up and is about to explode, Unho gets caught with his secret by Cheongwook.

altTitles.ja: 王様のプロポーズ

description.en:
The boy’s strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians’ school.

“…I entrust you, my world…”

And then… the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki.

Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth…

He’s feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!

altTitles.ja: 登校班

title.en: Isekai de Saikyou no Skill o Umidaseta node, Hitasura Musou Suru Koto ni Shimashita. ~ Ore Dake ga Skill no Suuchi o Katte ni Sousa ~

altTitles.ja: 異世界で最強のスキルを生み出せたので、ひたすら無双することにしました。　～俺だけがスキルの数値を勝手に操作～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai de Saikyou no Skill wo Umidasetanode, Hitasura Musou Suru Koto ni Shimashita. ~ Ore Dake ga Sukiru no Suuchi wo Katte ni Sousa ~

altTitles.en: I was able to create the strongest skill in another world, so I decided to be a matchless warrior. ~ I'm the only one who manipulates my status ~

description.en: When I was suddenly summoned to another world by some mysterious identity that said, "Pick three Skill Seeds". But wait, what does 'Skill Seeds' mean instead of just 'Skills'? Realizing the sole difference between the two, I awakened as the other world's first 'Hacker', capable of arbitrarily enhancing skills by manipulating their values! To start, I manipulated the skills of a beautiful girl, Mia, who suffered due to her skills being unsuitable for combat and joined forces with her to surpass those who had looked down on us!

Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

title.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.ja: 君のことが大大大大大好きな100人の彼女

altTitles.es-la: Las 100 Novias Que Te Quieren Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho Mucho

altTitles.ru: 100 девушек, которые очень-очень-очень-очень-очень сильно тебя любят

altTitles.zh-hk: 超超超超超喜歡你的100個女友

altTitles.pt-br: As 100 Namoradas que te Amam Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Muito, Mesmo.

altTitles.ja-ro: Kimi no koto ga daidaidaidaidai suki na 100-nin no Kanojo

altTitles.en: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You

altTitles.vi: 100 Cô Bạn Gái Này Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất, Rất Là Yêu Tôi Đó

altTitles.es-la: Mis 100 novias que me quieren mucho mucho

description.en:
Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. 

Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
description.ru: Что может быть хуже отказа на признание в любви? Сотня отказов на признание в любви! Айдзё Рэнтаро – безнадёжный романтик, признавшийся в любви уже сто раз, но по необъяснимым причинам каждый раз получавший отказ. В один прекрасный день перед ним предстаёт сам Бог Любви и говорит, что его ужасная удача в любви обернулась вспять! Теперь Айдзё предстоит встретить 100 девушек "Соулмейтов" – каждая из них предназначена ему самой судьбой и без памяти влюблена в него! Но вот беда: ни у одного человека не должно быть столько соулмейтов. Если он не ответит хоть одной из них взаимностью, девушку ждёт смерть от несчастного случая! Теперь это дело любви и смерти, а выбор за Айдзё.
description.pt-br: Aijou é um garoto que tem muito azar no amor e já foi rejeitado mais de 100 vezes. Desesperado ele vai num templo pedir ajuda aos deuses. E seu desejo foi atendido, para cada rejeição ele terá uma alma gêmea. Mas isso se tona uma maldição quando ele fica sabendo que se elas não forem felizes ao lado de sua alma gêmea, ele, elas vão morrer… Mas que merda, você ainda está lendo isso? Não escutou? São 100 garotas, 100! Não há tempo a perder!

title.en: It’s Too Hard to Chase the Tsundere Prince

altTitles.zh-ro: Ao Jiao Wangye Tai Nan Zhui

description.en:
This is a story about a murdered lady, who then time travels and is reborn as the second daughter in a wealthy household. She was often bullied in her own household. After time travelling, she acts all frail and weak in the situations she encounter, while intelligently overcoming crisis after crisis. Even without a royal background, she is slowly but surely climbing to the top!  
  
Novel Author : ZhaoZhao
description.fr: Une femme médecin assassinée, voyage dans le temps et renaît dans le corps de la deuxième fille d'un famille riche, souvent harcelée dans sa propre maison. Après ce voyage dans le temps, elle fait semblant d'être faible dans les situations qu'elle rencontre, tout affrontant intelligemment crises après crises.||

title.en: Final Boss Fake-out: The Protagonist Thinks She Killed Me So Now I'm Free!

altTitles.ja: ラスボス、やめてみた　～主人公に倒されたふりして自由に生きてみた～

altTitles.en: I Tried to Stop Being the Last Boss ~I Pretended to be Defeated by the Main Character and Tried to Live Freely~

altTitles.ja-ro: Last Boss, Yamete Mita ~Shujinkou ni Taosareta Furi Shite Jiyuu ni Ikite Mita~

description.en: The strongest final boss in RPG history figures out a way to get super rich in his own world! Demon Lord Menas, ruler of the Noa Empire, finds the Resistance's forces on his doorstep. While Alex, a determined, beautiful, blonde young lady stands before him, he gets this weird feeling of deja vu... Isn't this just like the prologue of 'ResNoa', the video game he plays in his dreams?! Menas realizes that he was the final boss of his own world all along! He fakes his death at the hands of Alex and seizes his chance at a brand new life with both hands.Our dark hero takes his world by storm, using whatever cheat codes he has to protect his newfound freedom!

title.en: Akuma to Hito to no Ma

altTitles.ja: 悪魔と人との間

description.en: Miyazaki, a high school boy who has been present where a cute erotic classmate is being attacked by a defect. I suddenly got help, and of course I was messed up ...! The secret relationship between Miyazaki and her begins!

altTitles.ja: サンダ

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

title.en: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kai Neko (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: 愛が重すぎるうちのヤンデレ飼い猫 (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja-ro: Ai ga Omosugiru Uchi no Yandere Kai Neko (Official Colored)

altTitles.en: My Yandere Cat Whose Love Is Too Heavy (Official Colored)

altTitles.pt-br: Meu amor é muito pesado, minha gata de estimação yandere (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja: 若葉ちゃんはわからせたい！

altTitles.en: Wakaba-chan Wants To Make Him Understand!
Wakaba-chan Wants to Make It Clear

description.en:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
description.ja: 『絶対BLになる世界VS絶対BLになりたくない男』の紺吉が贈るTwitter発ラブコメが、新連載開始！　女子が苦手な男子高校生のメガネくんは幼馴染のボーイッシュ女子・若葉とだけは会話ができる。でもある日、若葉がとびきり可愛い服装で現れて…!?　メガネくんに好かれたい若葉さんと女子にドキマギしちゃうメガネくんとのすれ違い＆攻防戦ラブコメ!!

title.en: Isekai NTR ~Shinyuu no Onna wo Saikyou Skill de Otosu Houhou~

altTitles.ja: 異世界NTR～親友のオンナを最強スキルで堕とす方法～

altTitles.th: ISEKAI NTR ~สร้างฮาเร็มโดยไม่ให้พรรคพวกรู้~

altTitles.ko: 이세계 NTR ~절친의 여자를 최강 스킬로 함락시키는 방법~

altTitles.zh-hk: 異世界NTR ～不被同伴發現地開後宮～
異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

altTitles.en: Isekai NTR: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill
NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

description.en: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
description.id: 'Diary of Desire' kini kembali dengan cerita yang lebih deep! Bagaimana jika keinginan yang bisa dimiliki oleh setiap manusia menjadi kenyataan? Apakah akhirnya akan bahagia atau malah membawa kehancuran?
description.ko:
더욱 더 매운맛으로 돌아온 욕망일기의 새로운 에피소드
인간이라면 누구나 가질법한 욕망,
그것이 현실로 이루어진다면?
그 끝은 과연 행복일까 파멸일까..

description.en:
Hwang Cho-min has been violently bullied since middle school. But when his estranged brother suddenly dies in a motorcycle accident, Cho-min finds out he was the leader of Imperial Gang, a huge gang. 

Now in possession of his brother's phone, Cho-min seizes this chance to get revenge on his high school bullies by ordering his brother's underlings to beat them up. But the King Game begins when his brother's girlfriend shows up and threatens to expose him unless he cooperates in taking down a rival gang. 

With his life now on the line, can Cho-min manage to continue this farce?

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

description.en:
Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
 Brought to you by mmk of 'Love Comedy Quest,' this is a pure love short comedy of the new era about 'neighbors'!

Kang Hyeon, who was ashamed of his poor family, cut off ties with those around him and studied desperately to achieve success, but eventually he realized that his ideals were wrong.
To make matters worse, Hyeon, who has cancer, gets run over while trying to save someone who fell on the subway tracks, and returns to the past while listening to the melody of a symphony.
Hyeon, who was determined not to live the same life as before, realizes that he has tremendous musical talent...

title.en: Transmigrating as the Younger Sister of a Bigshot with Multiple Identities

description.en: Dear Villainesses, you lost your fiancé and I lost my one billion! Just when I had received news that I inherited my family’s assets, I immediately transmigrated into a cookie cutter villainess story, as the hated villainess right after “I” made enemies of everyone in the story! Now witness me slither my way into everyone’s heart and reach the ending of the story in one piece!

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The first unique romantic comedy manga in the history of CoroCoro! The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.ja: チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

altTitles.ja: ゆるゆり

description.en: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
description.pt-br: Quatro garotas travessas ocupam ilegalmente a antiga sala do clube da Cerimônia Tradicional do Chá para criar o "Clube de Diversão". Essas atentadas... que ignoram repetidos avisos - em rebelião direta às justas diretrizes do Conselho Estudantil - decidem permanecer na sala até que finalmente se levantem e façam alguma coisa! Neste mangá um pouco lento, como o título sugere, cheio de trancos e barrancos, as quatro meninas saem de suas casas para passear juntas, com dias cheios dum pouco disso e daquilo!

description.en:
A lonely girl finds solace in her bag full of memories; now it's time for her to break through her shell.

---
- [Original Webtoon <kakao>](https://page.kakao.com/home/53607659)
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4622962)
- [Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_bogeum_wz)
- [Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>](https://ridibooks.com/books/3498007648)

altTitles.ja-ro: Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu

altTitles.ja: 僕の心のヤバイやつ
僕ヤバ

description.de:
Der Teenager Ichikawa Kyoutarou gehört zu den allerletzten auf seiner Schule. Neben seinen Bemühungen, Unterhaltungen mit einer bestimmten Klassenkameradin aufrechtzuerhalten, muss er sich außerdem noch dafür zusammenreißen, mörderische Dränge aus den Tiefen seiner Seele zu verbergen.

Eigentlich ist es aber eine niedliche Liebesgeschichte zwischen einem geistig gestörten Jungen und einer fröhlichen, leicht komisch, jedoch schönen Mädchen.
description.en:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

- Won the Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020 Award.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taisho Award.
- Won the top prize of 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards
description.ja:
学園カースト頂点の美少女・山田杏奈の殺害を妄想してはほくそ笑む、重度の中二病の陰キャ・市川京太郎。だが山田を観察する内に、京太郎が思う「底辺を見下す陽キャ」とは全然違うことに徐々に気づいていき…!? 陰キャ男子

---

- Exclusive art is occasionally posted to [the series' official account](https://twitter.com/boku__yaba/status/1060017522303414273)
description.ru: «Страшный психо-триллер», сосредоточенный на «тёмной стороне юности». История повествует о Киотаро Ичикаве — человеке, находящемся на самой низшей ступени в своей школе и скрывающем убийственный порыв, находящийся в самой глубине его души... на деле же, это милый ром-ком про странного мальчика и прекрасную, хоть и слегка странную, девушку.
description.es-la:
La historia trata sobre un joven llamado Kyotaro Ichikawa que sufre de un caso grave de “chūnibyō” y se divierte imaginando la muerte de una hermosa chica llamada Anna Yamada, quien está en la cima de la jerarquía social de la escuela. Sin embargo, mientras observa a Yamada, Kyotaro comienza a darse cuenta de que ella es muy diferente de lo que él pensaba.

 - Ganó el premio Tsugi ni Kuru Web Manga 2020.
- Fue nominado para el premio Manga Taisho en 2020 y 2021.
- Ganó el primer premio en los premios Tsutaya Comic de 2021.
description.pt-br:
Um "intenso thriller psicológico" centralizado no lado obscuro da adolescência. 

O mangá gira em torno de Kyoutaro Ichikawa, uma pessoa no fundo da hierarquia de sua escola, que esconde um impulso assassino no fundo de sua alma. Mas na realidade, é uma doce comédia romântica entre um garoto confuso e uma garota brilhante, embora um tanto estranha e bonita.

title.en: Nee, Mou Isso Tsukiacchau? Osananajimi no Bishoujo ni Tanomarete, Camo Kareshi Hajimemashita

altTitles.en: Hey, Wanna Go Out With Me? My Childhood Friend, a Beautiful Girl, Asked for My Help, and Now I've Become Her Camouflage Boyfriend.

altTitles.ja: ねぇ、もういっそつき合っちゃう？幼馴染の美少女に頼まれて、カモフラ彼氏はじめました

altTitles.zh-hk: 吶，要不我們交往吧？被美少女青梅竹馬拜託，開始假冒她的男友

description.en:
Masaichi Mazono, an otaku boy, and Toiro Kurumi, the most beautiful girl in school, are childhood friends. Toiro, who was always in Masaichi’s room, was supposed to be like family to him. 

But one day, Toiro, who was constantly getting annoyed by her romantic troubles, asks Masaichi to play the role of her boyfriend. They thought it would be simple to pretend to be a couple because they’d been together for so long, but their ideal childhood friend can’t possibly end up as a false lover…

_“E-eh no, holding hands is embarrassing.”_

A childhood friend who is more than a lover embarks on a more adventurous lover’s life than she could have dreamed!
description.ja: オタク男子・真園正市と、学校一の美少女・来海十色は腐れ縁の幼馴染。ある日、恋愛関係のトラブルに嫌気がさした十色に頼まれ、正市は彼氏役を演じることに。「元々ずっと一緒にいるから、カップルのフリも簡単！」と思っていた二人だが、相性抜群の幼馴染が偽の恋人で終わるはずがなく――!?

altTitles.ja-ro: うちのメイドがウザすぎる！

altTitles.en: UzaMaid: Our Maid Is Way Too Annoying!

description.en:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
description.ja: 母を亡くし父と二人で暮らす小学生女子・ミーシャ。そんな父子家庭にやってきた新人家政婦は、やたらマッチョな上に三度の飯より幼女が大好きで…！？

altTitles.ja: 恋愛の授業

description.en: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...? A love-learning romantic comedy between a beautiful JK girl and a boy.
